description: This is by far my favorite task management application. It has been carefully thought through and development is rapid and open. In a twist to what we see often this application is focused on on-premise installation of the software where you control the data but there are syncing options. I have looked at every task management app out there and this is by far the best with a strong focus on GTD. thank you
summary: Well thought out GTD task management tool

description: Very similar to Omnifocus, couple of points that caused me to Remove it. 1) I don't like the BOLD on Titles, if I could turn that off I could probably use it. 2) The Contexts/tagging isn't as slick as Omni (it works, just not as fluid as I would like). Overall very nice app.
summary: Good but not quite right for me

description: I was finidng it useful but now it has reverted to a 'new' app, with all my projects and tasks gone and no record they ever existed... So looking for an alternative now
schönes Programm für die Aufgabenplannung. Täglich in Benutzung
summary: schönes Programm für die tägliche Aufgabenplannung

description: beaucoup de fonctionnalité et bon support
Ne se lance pas (KDE Neon). Supprimée et du coup passage à GTD Gnome
i think it is a good app. Highly recommended!
